column2: b'Nakado Riku Animation: Hijouyou Mochidashi Bukuro wo Youi Shiyou'
b'For the 8th anniversary of the Great East Japan Earthquake, Fukushima Prefecture support character Nakado Riku and her friends teach us how to prepare an earthquake survival kit.'
